name: Handl
headline: Handl converts documents (invoices, income stabs, custom forms, etc.)â¦
description: Handl converts documents (invoices, income stabs, custom forms, etc.)  into structured data through simple API. 100% automation implies no need for any supervision/manual work on your side and allows you to reduce costs, improve response time, and operate accurate data. Powered by the merge of ML/AI + humans-in-the-loop to work in real-time even for the most complicated cases

# Paperwork doesn’t have to be
## a tough nut to crack
Organize unstructured docs by type automatically and extract data in seconds. Say bye to long manual data extraction and human errors
[Request Demo](https://handl.ai/<#contact>)

## How it works in 15 seconds
## Unlock the power of seamless document processing with IDP
Handl solves the «hire-more-people-for-paper» syndrome. It extracts data from familiar and unique documents in seconds, automating processes sans human interventionIt's like saying NO to a second slice of cake — hard, but way more beneficial
### Precision Recognition
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe7b_Group.svg)
Accurately identify and interpret diverse document types
### Efficient Data Extraction
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe7d_Group.svg)
Extract information swiftlyand reliably for streamlined operations
### Adaptive Learning
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe80_Group-1.svg)
Continuously improving algorithms for enhanced accuracy
### Customizable Solutions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe7c_Group-2.svg)
Tailor our technology to suit your unique document processing needs
### HITL
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe7f_Group-4.svg)
Involve people in checkingthe results for 100% recognitionof any documents
### Antifraud
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe7e_Group-3.svg)
Quickly recognize forgeriesin documents
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe89_shutterstock_17559129267%207.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe87_shutterstock_17559129267%209.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe83_shutterstock_17559129267%208.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe85_shutterstock_17559129267%206.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe81_shutterstock_17559129267%2010.png)
## How we free up employees' time from tasks they do not like?
The employee has only one task left — upload documents. We took care of all the other stages
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba00b743df5125ea3349_Frame%2048097192.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba00b743df5125ea334d_Frame%2030948.svg)

Input
Upload documents via API, cloud drive or locally
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba00b743df5125ea333e_Rectangle%20730.svg)

Ingest, classify and pre-process any document

Accurately capture key values from unstructured docs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba00b743df5125ea333f_Frame%2048097069.svg)

Involve people in checking the results for 100% recognition of any documents
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba00b743df5125ea333f_Frame%2048097069.svg)

cost saving

reduction processing time

of accuracy
## «But we’ve already seen similar solutions.
## What are you better at?»
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010086_Frame%2048097095.svg)
The cutting-edge document recognition system we recently introduced stands out for its remarkable accuracy and processing speed, delivering a unique levelof efficiency in document management
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010085_Frame%2048097100.svg)
Developed by the innovative approach of Handl, this product utilizes advanced artificial intelligence algorithms, not only recognizing text but also adaptingto various document styles, making it highly flexibleand versatile
01.
AI with human validation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010099_expand_less_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24%201.svg)
Our AI teams up with humans-in-the-loop for accuracy, speedand flexible prowess, evenfor the toughest document cases
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010095_Group%2030948.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf601008b_Group%2030905.png)
02.
Constant additional training
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010099_expand_less_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24%201.svg)
Your accuracy is improving month to month, algorithms are retraining to deliver better results
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010097_Group%2030949.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf601008d_1.gif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf601008f_2.gif)
03.
Complex documents
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010099_expand_less_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24%201.svg)
Handl conquers complex, scribbled scrolls and typewritten tomes. Say hello to reduced costs, lightning-fast document processing, and an error-free zoneEver tried decoding a doctor's handwriting? We do that
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010091_Group%2030903.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010087_Group%2030903.png)
04.
Smart antifraud
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010099_expand_less_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24%201.svg)
A cunning fraudster forged his passport using neural networksand wanted to take out a loan?Not todayOur antifraud detects even the most ingenious fakes using 60 parameters
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010093_Group%2030927.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010089_Group%2030942.png)

## How it works in 15 seconds
## Unlock the power of seamless document processing with IDP
Handl solves the «hire-more-people-for-paper» syndrome. It extracts data from familiar and unique documents in seconds, automating processes sans human interventionIt's like saying NO to a second slice of cake — hard, but way more beneficial
### Precision Recognition
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe7b_Group.svg)
Accurately identify and interpret diverse document types
### Efficient Data Extraction
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe7d_Group.svg)
Extract information swiftlyand reliably for streamlined operations
### Adaptive Learning
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe80_Group-1.svg)
Continuously improving algorithms for enhanced accuracy
### Customizable Solutions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe7c_Group-2.svg)
Tailor our technology to suit your unique document processing needs
### HITL
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe7f_Group-4.svg)
Involve people in checkingthe results for 100% recognitionof any documents
### Antifraud
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607b9f07ef712e71b40fe7e_Group-3.svg)
Quickly recognize forgeriesin documents

## «But we’ve already seen similar solutions.
## What are you better at?»
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010086_Frame%2048097095.svg)
The cutting-edge document recognition system we recently introduced stands out for its remarkable accuracy and processing speed, delivering a unique levelof efficiency in document management
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010085_Frame%2048097100.svg)
Developed by the innovative approach of Handl, this product utilizes advanced artificial intelligence algorithms, not only recognizing text but also adaptingto various document styles, making it highly flexibleand versatile
01.
AI with human validation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010099_expand_less_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24%201.svg)
Our AI teams up with humans-in-the-loop for accuracy, speedand flexible prowess, evenfor the toughest document cases
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010095_Group%2030948.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf601008b_Group%2030905.png)
02.
Constant additional training
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010099_expand_less_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24%201.svg)
Your accuracy is improving month to month, algorithms are retraining to deliver better results
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010097_Group%2030949.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf601008d_1.gif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf601008f_2.gif)
03.
Complex documents
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010099_expand_less_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24%201.svg)
Handl conquers complex, scribbled scrolls and typewritten tomes. Say hello to reduced costs, lightning-fast document processing, and an error-free zoneEver tried decoding a doctor's handwriting? We do that
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010091_Group%2030903.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010087_Group%2030903.png)
04.
Smart antifraud
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010099_expand_less_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24%201.svg)
A cunning fraudster forged his passport using neural networksand wanted to take out a loan?Not todayOur antifraud detects even the most ingenious fakes using 60 parameters
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010093_Group%2030927.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f1032244a76804a7f93b8/6607ba0929e8fefaf6010089_Group%2030942.png)

generated_description:
**Handl: Transforming Document Management with Smart Automation**

Founded in 2018 and hailing from Y Combinator's W20 batch, Handl is a San Francisco-based startup that is revolutionizing how businesses process and manage documents. Their mission? To convert unstructured documents like invoices, income statements, and custom forms into structured data through a seamless API. By leveraging a powerful combination of machine learning, AI, and human oversight, Handl ensures that document processing is not just fast but also accurate—eliminating the need for manual intervention.

### What They Do

Handl’s technology automates the document processing lifecycle, allowing companies to significantly reduce costs, streamline response times, and improve data accuracy. The system intelligently classifies documents, extracts relevant information, and enhances data quality—all in the blink of an eye. It stands out as an innovative solution for organizations looking to free up their employees from tedious paperwork tasks.

The platform offers real-time, 100% automated data extraction that adapts to even the trickiest documents, all while maintaining accuracy. Think of it as employing a digital assistant that never tires but also knows to ask for human validation when needed. This “human-in-the-loop” approach ensures a level of oversight that adds an extra layer of integrity to the process.

### Key Features

1. **Precision Recognition**: Accurately identifies and interprets various types of documents, from handwritten notes to structured forms.
2. **Efficient Data Extraction**: Captures pertinent information rapidly, making operations smoother and faster.
3. **Adaptive Learning**: Continuously improving algorithms adapt to new document styles, enhancing accuracy over time.
4. **Customizable Solutions**: Tailors its technology to meet specific business needs across different industries.
5. **Fraud Detection**: Smart antifraud systems detect forgeries with meticulous attention to detail.

### Who They Serve

Handl serves a diverse range of industries including logistics, insurance, finance, accounting, and healthcare. Its solutions are designed to excel in environments that deal with complex documentation, where manual data entry can often lead to errors and inefficiencies.

### The Team Behind Handl

With a keen team of 29 employees, Handl is thriving under the guidance of prominent partners. This innovative group combines expertise in machine learning and document management to continually push boundaries in automated document solutions. 

### Contact and Discover More

Curious to see how Handl can streamline your document processing? You can request a demo and more information on their offerings through their website at [Handl.ai](https://handl.ai).

In a world increasingly dominated by data, Handl's approach exemplifies how smart automation can enhance business efficiency and accuracy—making paperwork a breeze rather than a burden.
